actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to undertake a study of Superfund sites to assess the progress in reducing the health and environmental risks and to prioritize the need to clean up the remaining sites.
subjects: Liability for toxic substances pollution damages

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to study and report to the Congress on the extent to which environmental and public health risks have been reduced at Superfund sites listed on the National Priorities List and to evaluate remaining environmental and health risks at those sites.

titles.title: To require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to undertake a study of Superfund sites to assess the progress in reducing the health and environmental risks and to prioritize the need to clean up the remaining sites.
